Description: Lunch-box; engraved brass; inscribed but no blazon.
Bibliographic references: Allan 1971a / Later Mamluk metalwork - II. A series of lunch-boxes (p.2)
Barrett 1949a / Islamic metalwork in the British Museum (pl.31)
Akbarnia et al 2018 / The Islamic World: a History in Objects (p.129, fig.4)
